member.name: MIB_TCP6TABLE
member.summary: TheMIB_TCP6TABLE structure contains a table of TCP connections for IPv6 on the local computer.

member.name: MIB_TCP6TABLE.dwNumEntries
member.summary: A value that specifies the number of TCP connections in the array.

member.name: MIB_TCP6TABLE.table
member.summary: An array of structures containing TCP connection entries.
